course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Plant Biology Laboratory
course.description: This course is designed to introduce theories and practical techniques used in the current research of plant biology, plant molecular biology and biochemistry to students. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: Grace Chan
reviews.comment_content:
Simple and straight forward experiments related to plants.
I was taking the lab course together with the lecture, they are not much related tho.
Forming groups for the whole branch to work together. If you have good teamwork, you may often leave early before the official end time.
reviews.comment_teaching:
TAs are nice. They are willing to help and explain.
Our group keep asking TA about the experimental setups and lab report questions, which does help a lot for completing the report.
Melody comes to us from time to time, often asking you questions all of a sudden lol
reviews.comment_grading:
Quite good grading. My groupmates get good grade too. By putting more efforts, the grading is actually unexpectedly nice for me.
Lab reports are mostly 80% above.
The report is 9.x/10
I forgot about the final exam grading.
reviews.comment_workload:
Not tough.
A biweekly report, submitting a week after your lab session. Long questions and some drawings are required in the report.
Another individual report, with a given question at the beginning of the semester.
Final exam is required. Basically you can focus on lab report questions and the lab manual (like some crucial steps), quite straightforward.

reviews.author: Aliceee
reviews.comment_content:
Not difficult at all

Lab 1 plant structure
Lab 2 Photosynthesis and respiration
Lab 3 Plant growth and development
Lab 4 Effect of touch on plants

In lab2, many groups cannot get the result, and melody gives us the class result instead
reviews.comment_teaching: Melody and TAs are willing to teach us if we encounter any difficulties. So, if you have any problems, don't hesitate to ask!
reviews.comment_grading:
good grading
it's easy to get B range

assessment scheme
50% assignment and lab reports
10% lab performance
40% examination
reviews.comment_workload:
need to attend pre-lab tutorial before the lab

4 labs
1000 words aquaponic essay

only 4 lab reports, essay and final

reviews.author: Pinkylaucp
reviews.comment_content:
Not difficult at all.

If you attended lifs2080 already, the content about plant hormones should be simple.

But the second experiment on determining the rate of photosynthesis and respiration is a bit tough. Prof finally gave us a class data for us to work on the worksheet.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Good

Ta are willing to help you and answer your questions. Don't hesitate to seek help if you have any problems.
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grade
4 lab reports: 10%each
1assignment:10%
Performance: 10%
Final exam:10%

Lab 1: 39/56(below mean)
Lab 2:19/20
Lab 3: 10/10
Lab 4: 8/10
Assignment: 7/10
Performance: not released
Final: not released

Finally got B+
reviews.comment_workload:
Very light work load

Only 4 lab sessions

But this year we have to write a 1000 word essay on aquaponics

There are after lab tutorials but it is just for you to ask questions on the worksheet if you encounter any problems. It is fine for you to skip the after lab session if you know how to do the worksheet.

reviews.author: uststudent
reviews.title: good grade course
reviews.comment_content:
Plant hormone, structure... (easy if you study lifs2080 plant bio)
Lab work is easy especially with good groupmates. Plants are quite interesting. One lab requires you to touch the plant for a period of time. FUN, then analyse the result by T-test in excel, would be explained by TA during lesson.
reviews.comment_teaching: Good and clear teaching from Melody. TAs are also helpful during lab if there are any questions. They all welcome you to ask questions. Usually won't minus your marks unlike other labs. Atmosphere is relaxing when comparing to other general labs.
reviews.comment_grading: Good grading. No full mark in lab worksheet, always lower than group mates, final result is not released. Some questions are not sure in exam. Overall grade: B+
reviews.comment_workload: Minimum workload for a 3 credit- bearing course, only worksheet to be finished after each lab. Only 4 labs , one in 2 weeks. Explanation of lab would be given before during 1 hour lesson. Post lab review lesson will also be conducted after 1 week in case you dont know how to finish the worksheet. Groupmates could also carry u:)

reviews.author: DemonicMocha
reviews.comment_content:
It follows the topic on LIFS2080 Plant Biology but follows on plant anatomy, i.e. plant structure, hormones, etc.

In case you have no idea how to study for final exam, there is a review session which tells you all you need to prepare for the exam.
reviews.comment_teaching: Melody is very friendly. She will answer all your questions patiently. You can be late 15 minutes and forgot to bring your lab coat and she still wouldn't punish you for it.
reviews.comment_grading: I was very hea at doing lab report and got mostly below mean score in report, but I still got a B overall.
reviews.comment_workload:
Lab report every week, due the next lab session.
Easy lab report, normally complete in around 1 hour.
